remarks: A lattice element is nonzero if an atom is under it.  (Contributed by NM, 26-May-2012.)
statement:
atlen0.b $e |- B = ( Base ` K ) $.
atlen0.l $e |- .<_ = ( le ` K ) $.
atlen0.z $e |- .0. = ( 0. ` K ) $.
atlen0.a $e |- A = ( Atoms ` K ) $.
atlen0 $p |- ( ( ( K e. AtLat /\ X e. B /\ P e. A ) /\ P .<_ X ) -> X =/= .0. ) $.
